PositionHistory.Description:
Application: Swiss Re Data Language (SDL)
The SDL Tool is the repository and modeling environment that supports users in designing and understanding the structure of the business. It is the Swiss Re Internal Group data management and documentation tool.
Role and responsibilities
* Responsible for the data power migration (DP Migration) of SDL in 3 instances. ; * Developed test cases and performed unit testing to identify and resolve issues before deployment. ; * Delivered the code with zero defects.
Environment:Windows XP, RAD as IDE, CVS as version control tool, Internet Explorer 7, Java, Mercury Quality center.

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Systems Engineer
Systems Engineer

Competency.name: Responsible for the maintenance of the application and production support
Responsible for the Technical and design
Bachelors Degree > Bachelor of Engineering > Bachelor of Engineering Electronics & Communications

CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Educational Qualifications: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics & Communications

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Rashmi Taranalli has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. During her last employment she was working as a Technology Analyst at Infosys Technologies Limited. Rashmi has extensive knowledge of CVS, Mercury Quality Center, Java, Oracle, Rapid Application Development RAD, Microsoft Internet Explorer, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, DB2, Struts Web Application Framework, Java Swing, QMF, Java Server Pages, Hibernate, AJAX, Oracle Applications, Microsoft Visio, Client/Server, Class Diagrams, TOAD, Rational Rose, Oracle Report, Oracle 8, GUI Applications, Business Objects. So far Rashmi has not gained any managerial experience.
